import itertools

def solution(puzzle):
 tree_positions = [(i, j) for i, col in enumerate(puzzle[0]) if col=='T']

 possible_fects = [[x, y] for y, col in enumerate(puzzle[0]) for x in range(len(puzzle[0])) if col=='T' and abs(x-position[0]) <= 1 and abs(y-position[1]) <= 1][:tents-1] # Get possible tent positions
 if len(list(set(possible_fects))) > 1: # If there is more than one possible tent position

 return [[x[0] if x[0] < len(puzzle[0]) else x[0]-len(puzzle[0]) if x[0] >= len(puzzle[0]) else x[0]+len(puzzle[0]) for x in row] for row in placements] # Output in the required format
